net.consensys.cava.net.tls

Class TLS

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.net.tls.TLS

  • public final class TLS
extends java.lang.Object
    Common utilities for TLS.

    This class depends upon the BouncyCastle library being available and added as a Provider. See https://www.bouncycastle.org/wiki/display/JA1/Provider+Installation.

    BouncyCastle can be included using the gradle dependencies org.bouncycastle:bcprov-jdk15on and org.bouncycastle:bcpkix-jdk15on.

    • Method Detail

      • createSelfSignedCertificateIfMissing

        public static boolean createSelfSignedCertificateIfMissing(java.nio.file.Path key,
                                                           java.nio.file.Path certificate)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Create a self-signed certificate, if it is not already present.

        If both the key or the certificate file are missing, they will be re-created as a self-signed certificate.

        Parameters:
        key - The key path.
        certificate - The certificate path.
        Returns:
        true if a self-signed certificate was created.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs creating the certificate.

      • readPemFile

        public static byte[] readPemFile(java.nio.file.Path certificate)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Read a PEM-encoded file.
        Parameters:
        certificate - The path to a PEM-encoded file.
        Returns:
        The bytes for the PEM content.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

        public static byte[] certificateFingerprint(java.nio.file.Path certificate)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Calculate the fingerprint for a PEM-encoded certificate.
        Parameters:
        certificate - The path to a PEM-encoded certificate.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • certificateFingerprint

        public static byte[] certificateFingerprint(java.security.cert.Certificate certificate)
                                     throws java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException
        Calculate the fingerprint for certificate.
        Parameters:
        certificate - The certificate.
        Returns:
        The fingerprint bytes for the certificate.
        Throws:
        java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException - If the certificate cannot be encoded.
